title: Just want to say thanks riot
body:
Among all the complains about the game balance op champs reworks etc

Just wanted to say I was asking a lot on the server transfer and why it's delayed a lot so thanks on working on it and for the discount I really appreciate that you guys listen to your community and making the game that we all love <3

replies.body: The Devs do their best with getting stuff fixed asap, and it still really sucks this happened to begin with. You know uncle rito will do us right when they need to though ^_^
